name: Demon Flea
description:
Demon Flea is a prototype of an arcade-style game that was designed for mobile devices in mind during an in-house game jam while I was a member of Polynomad. Despite that, only PC and Mac builds were done. As a flea, your objective is to reach the end of the beard strands while avoiding the dragon, sheeps and wolves.

Credits:

Daniel - Programming and Game Design

Kevin MacLeod - Music

FreeSound.org - Sound
